doc:
Alec Jason https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alec_Jason 0 Alec Jason (born Alexander Jason on 13 July 1911 in London - died 2 October 2000 in Los Angeles) was an English actor. He is the father of Harvey Jason and he was married to Marie Goldblatt until her death. Alec_Jason ( born Alexander_Jason on 13_July_1911 in London - died 2_October_2000 in Los_Angeles ) was an_English_actor . He is the_father of Harvey_Jason and he was_married to Marie_Goldblatt until her_death .
